contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10th day of December, 2001, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted limited to the following issue:
Whether the Agricultural Lands Condemnation Approval Boai-d and the governing bodies of the local government units encompassing the agricultural security area must approve of the opening of a private road under the Private Road Act when that road is in an agricultural security area?
